#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll mod=1000000007;
vector<int>adj[100001];
vector<ll>dp(100001,0);
vector<int>g(100001,0);
ll sum;
ll dfs(int node)
{
  int k;
  g[node]=1;
  dp[node]=1;
  for(k=0;k<adj[node].size();k++)
  {
    if(g[adj[node][k]]==0)
     dp[node]=dp[node]*(1+dfs(adj[node][k]));
    if(dp[node]>=mod)
     dp[node]%=mod;
  }
  sum+=dp[node];
  if(sum>=mod)
    sum%=mod;
  return dp[node];
};
int main()
{
  int t,i,n,u,v;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
   sum=0;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
      scanf("%d%d",&u,&v);
      adj[u].push_back(v);
      adj[v].push_back(u);
    }
    dfs(1);
    printf("%lld\n",sum);
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      adj[i].clear();
      dp[i]=g[i]=0;
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
